text: I discovered this place a few years ago while visiting my daughter and now I have to order a pie every time I'm in town. The flavour and aroma is fantastic and the toppings are very generous. Beware, this pizza is addictive. I keep trying to figure out how to take it home on the plane.
Best old school pizza ever!! Take-out or delivery. Located on the south shore. Worth the drive
Just had the "All Dressed" pizza - fantastic. Can't wait to have it again! Love love love!!!! We just flew in from DC for it.
